item.description:
Enjoy an afternoon socializing with other Fun People and being entertained with a free lecture by an expert on National Parks.

Experienced National Park Ranger, Bernie Jwaszewski, will be presenting his dynamic slides about The Trans Mountain highway, today known as The Going-To-The-Sun-Road. It's a 50+ mountain road that traverses Glacier National Park east/west with views of the continental divide from Logan Pass. Not for the faint of heart but the vistas are worth the white-knuckle ride.

More about the presenter...

Bernie has crisscrossed the country in his RV, and to date has worked in six (6) of our great National Parks the likes of Acadia, Glacier, Grand Teton, Yellowstone, Zion, and the Cape Hatteras National Seashore either as a professional guide or as a National Park Ranger. His first year at Glacier Park in Montana he lived on the Blackfeet Indian reservation, and drove one of the Parks historic open top red buses in the Park He went back five years later and served as National Park Ranger. Join Bernie for a ride on the famous The Going-To-The-Sun-Road."
item.name: Presentation on National Parks
